document.title: Universe (Extract)
document.citation: Simple English Wikipedia: “Universe”. Retrieved from https://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/Universe on 20 Aug 2015.
document.body: The invention of the telescope in the Netherlands, 1608, was a milestone in astronomy. By the mid-19th century they were good enough for other galaxies to be distinguished. Meanwhile, the Newtonian dynamics (equations) showed how the Solar System worked.
